rComments: Amis is absolutely AMAZING! She's extremely helpful and always there for you need her. There were 4 writing assignments with a final 5th paper. Two very affordable books were required along with a $10 newspaper subscription. Definitely took the class just for her. Subject proved to be interesting as well.

Maggie is a really nice professor who really wants you to do well. She only makes you do 3 long essays for the whole quarter which takes away some stress and let's you study for other classes. You need to really try if you want an A though, I put a lot of effort into my essays and was not able to get past a B+ but if you write well it's possible.

Maggie is the best. She is so helpful and understanding and gives a lot of great insight too. She loves open discussion and the more you give the more you get in her class. She's really encouraging and is always willing to help with anything!!
Maggie is such a sweet professor. She cares about her students a lot. She makes the New Yorker fun and interesting. I enjoyed taking this course. Take this course if you can!

Outstanding teacher! Very enthusiastic about her students and class. You have daily readings of an article from The New Yorker and then you discuss them in class the next day. Participation helps A LOT when it comes to Prof. Amis giving you the overall grade. You write an essay every 3 weeks, for a total of 3. Enroll in her class if you can!

The class is easier than other W2 classes. Only wrote 3 essays in the quarter. But it is a different kind of essay, not your regular research paper. In class discussions, she definitely know what shes talking about, she is skilled professor. Highly Recommend this class!
maggie is an awesome writing 2 teacher shes super chill and she makes the class fun its an easy writing class and a good experience i highly recommend this class with her

Maggie Amis is as an awesome teacher! I had hear for: "What inside the New Yorker". You read articles and write about them. Its a lot less work than other writing classes and she's super nice. I highly recommend this class.
